DynamicsProcessorType: Controls how each band will react to audio above its threshold
PeakMode: Controls how quickly the bands will react to a signal above its threshold
LinkMode: Whether to compress all channels equally, and how to evaluate the overall level
LookAheadMsec: The amount of time to look ahead of the current audio. Allows for transients to be included in dynamics processing.
bAnalogMode: Toggles treating the attack and release envelopes as analog-style vs digital-style. Analog will respond a bit more naturally/slower.
bFourPole: Turning off FourPole mode will use cheaper, shallower 2-pole crossovers
bBypass: Whether or not to bypass effect
ExternalAudioBus: If set, uses output of provided submix as modulator of input signal for dynamics processor (Uses input signal as default modulator)
ExternalSubmix: If set, uses output of provided submix as modulator of input signal for dynamics processor (Uses input signal as default modulator)
KeyGainDb: Gain to apply to key signal if external input is supplied
bKeyAudition: Audition the key modulation signal, bypassing enveloping and processing the input signal.
Bands: Each band is a full dynamics processor, affecting at a unique frequency range
